name: Gaia (itch)
description:
CONTROLS:

  • WSAD/Arrows/Space - Movement,
  • Z/X/T/Right Shift - Action
  • R - Restart

Created for Ludum Dare 38 ( see entry) in under 48 hours.

Theme: A Small World


Timelapse Video


Change Log:

  • 1.0.1 (4-24-2017) - Getting stuck in clouds and walls fixed, cloud speed fixed, FPS fixed.
  • 1.0.2 (4-30-2017) - Added alternate keys T and R Shift for Z action. (WebGL only)
